website_summaries.verdict: A natural, effective option that also includes vitamin D for a much better price than brands with similar formulas.
pros: These drops are vegan and don't contain any flavors, additives, dairy, gluten, soy, or colors, making them a great all-natural option for a much more manageable price
Since many pediatricians recommend vitamin D drops for babies, this 2-in-1 formula is convenient
The drops are easy to give to babies, and parents appreciate their effectiveness
cons: The included dropper seems poorly designed and cannot be thoroughly cleaned, so many parents use a different dropper

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE! MOLD!! Don't give this to your babies!!
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this no stars I would. When I first got the drops they were clumpy. I'm a first time user and as it states on the package "shake well before use" I thought the clumps were normal. After a few days I opened up the bottle to find mold on the dropper. The smell inside the bottle was disgusting. Dumped it out to find the liquid had gone bad and formed mold!! The bottle doesn't expire until 2018 so I know I didn't accidentally get an old batch. I'm extremely disappointed and pretty disgusted in this product!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea DiBella

customer_reviews.title: Works for a bery gasy baby.
customer_reviews.text: My baby had very bad gas problem since born and she was very unhappy crying all the time, there was nothing to calm her down. Since she started on this probiotic, a big change :) 24h latter a very calm and happy girl. She was been taking it for a month now and has been working every day. I have read that babies born from c-section have more gas problems because during the surgery the mother gets IV antibiotics that kill her and baby instestinal flora. For me is working very well.
customer_reviews.author: Doly

customer_reviews.title: A must have for kids
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this stuff. I've been using for 6 months now for my son who is 17 months. He would always get so constipated and ever since using he hasn't been constipated once - it is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: This saved us!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby had horrible colic. We tried everything and were feeling so helpless. Someone suggested trying a probiotic. We had nothing to lose, so we gave it a shot. Within 3 days, the crying stopped. She was like a different baby. She was smiling and happy. We’ve recommended this to so many parents since then.
customer_reviews.author: Our Fine House

customer_reviews.title: Bottle arrived hot!
customer_reviews.text: This came in a plastic envelope that was roasting from the summer heat. When I opened it, the bottle was extremely hot to the touch. The label says store in a cool place so I will not be giving it to my baby, I’m sure the probiotics are dead as well. I’ll be purchasing this product in a store next time.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Lang

customer_reviews.title: Let me just say I don't know where our lives ...
customer_reviews.text: Let me just say I don't know where our lives would be without these probiotics! My daughter had very irregular bowls often constipated and then would have diarrhea. After a week with these daily drops shes completely regular and not so fussy anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Kuntz97537

customer_reviews.title: These are by far the best probiotic drops and it’s a plus that they have ...
customer_reviews.text: As a new Mom, I was looking for anything to help keep my baby regular. These are by far the best probiotic drops and it’s a plus that they have vitamin D. I was told to supplement my breastfed baby with vitamin D because they do not receive enough vitamin D through their mothers milk. Love these! Have bought multiple times!
customer_reviews.author: JuJuBee

customer_reviews.title: Bye bye baby gas problems!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby has gas issues at about 3 weeks old and we read about probiotics. We give him the 4 drops per day into a bottle of breast milk, and he hasn’t had any gas since then! Win!! And love the combo probiotics plus Vit D so we don’t have to worry about giving him separate drops for his Vit-D.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best brand
customer_reviews.text: These are the best! We tried few brands and options and nothing worked until we switched to Mommy's bliss! We use the probiotics and vitamin version and also bought the gas drops. Works miracles! My baby is so much more relaxed, no stomach aches, can sleep for few hours during the night without waking up... can't recommend this enough! Thank you, Mommy's bliss! We're forever your fans!
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but it works
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this with our little guy since he was about 3 months old. It took a few days of consistent use for everything to kick in, but it does work. A little trick that we use is that we mix it into his bottle in the morning. He doesn't notice any change of flavor or taste.
customer_reviews.author: Simran and Sachin

customer_reviews.title: Great soy and dairy free option!
customer_reviews.text: We had trouble with all other probiotic and vitamin d options. I don’t know if there were traces of soy or dairy in them but none of them worked for us. My son is soy and dairy intolerant. They all made him sick and caused lots of stomach pain. We have had no adverse reactions with this and he takes them perfectly. The only con is that it’s hard to get 5 drops in when he’s squirming and just being a typical baby lol. It’d be nice if they had a syringe to administer these.
customer_reviews.author: vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!!
customer_reviews.text: These helped us tremendously. My LO had tummy problems when he was a newborn and we gave this every day with tremendous results! Helped his belly feel better, made him less gassy, and he was a happier baby overall! 10/10 would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kaytlin

customer_reviews.title: Keep Kids Healthy
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these products! Probiotics help keep my daughter's gut, and by extension immune system, healthy. The added vitamin D is a great bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Batty

customer_reviews.title: Love this probiotic!! But Broken glass syringe.
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves this probiotic and I order and buy all the time on amazon and at the store. Usually I never have an issue but this time the glass syringe was broken. I didn’t return because I needed it right then so I used the other syringe I had. This is a great probiotic for babies and I have used since my baby was a newborn and he is now 7 months. Love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lundquist

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing!!! my baby was having serious stomach issues also constipation issues and our doctor recommend these,we started giving them to him every morning and it helped immediately
customer_reviews.author: Mom03

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product, hopefully for a little ones digestive troubles
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product when I was breastfeeding my infant daughter, to make sure that her digestion was up to par. I like that it also has vitamin d added to it. We used it when she was experiencing colic symptoms, and was super gassy and irritable after altering my diet.
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Mfg date
customer_reviews.text: So I had believed that item was expired as it had a mfg date on bottle and box of 7/2018. I called mommy’s bliss to clarify the expiration date as there wasn’t one on box or label. Operator had stated the item is good up to two years after the mfg date. Haven’t given it yet to my baby will update once started.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Sayles

customer_reviews.title: Has made a difference
customer_reviews.text: Our little guy has been using these for two months now and it’s made such a difference. He’s much more comfortable and happy. We are even getting longer stretches at night. I love that it also has the Vitamin D drops. Then combination makes it so much easier on the mom to 4!
customer_reviews.author: Lohryn

customer_reviews.title: Helpful for baby tummy problems
customer_reviews.text: The first one I was sent was expired but I was sent a new one and it’s helped my 3 month olds stomach a lot! He was having issues pooping and now he’s finally getting better! Give it time and it will help tremendously
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Small dose packs a big punch
customer_reviews.text: Probiotics plus vitamin D, what more could you ask for? The fact that these do what other drops do in such a small amount keeps my daughter from spinning then back at me. She hates other types of vitamin D Drops because of the volume she must consume. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: J Lamb

customer_reviews.title: GreT
customer_reviews.text: Daughter enjoys taking this each morning helps her have a healthy fit and get added vitamins
customer_reviews.author: VanHusen Photography

customer_reviews.title: These are good. I think it helped my son’s tummy issues
customer_reviews.text: These are good. I think it helped my son’s tummy issues, unless they just coincidentally stopped when he started taking the drops. He used to spit up a lot and he doesn’t really anymore. He used to gag when I gave him Tri-Vi-Sol, but these he takes with no complaints.My only gripes are that the dropper is very hard to clean, and the bottle is small so I went through it quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: love this! happy baby, happy mama
customer_reviews.text: I put these drops in my baby's bottle every day ( 5 drops is one serving.) I love that it has both probiotics and vitamin D-- I was doing two different droppers before, so it's one less step! I've also noticed that my toddler naps better, has less tummy aches, and seems "better" overall (mood, seems content, happy). whenever the bottle runs out I notice within a day or two, that she's a LOT fussier. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: Our daughter had been constipated since starting solids, and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our daughter had been constipated since starting solids, and after about 4 days of giving her this probiotic, she is now REALLY regular! She loves it too. She'll smack her lips, and get excited when I show her the bottle. We do not miss a single day, and we are now on a monthly subscription to make sure we don't run out!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This product has helped keep my son regular. All 3 of my older kids have struggled with constipation. I tried this on my youngest and he is the first of our 4 kids to not have a battle with constipation. I definitely recommend this to anyone that has that struggle with their kids. This product is definitely worth the expense.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Burnham

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: Don’t waste your hard earned money on this! I used it daily based on the directions on the box and it barely lasted me 1-2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Steerfork

customer_reviews.title: but her pediatrician said that was perfectly fine. She hasn't seemed to have any tummy troubles ...
customer_reviews.text: We are still getting into the groove with these. They did make baby's poop a dark green, but her pediatrician said that was perfectly fine. She hasn't seemed to have any tummy troubles since starting these and babies need vitamin D, so we are going to keep taking these for now.
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: I don’t know if this product works but what I ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t know if this product works but what I don’t care for is the dropper—I cant tell if I’m picking up the right dose and since the liquid is somewhat grainy, each time I administer this, the consistency varies. I stopped using this because of my concern regarding dosage. Baby also seemed to spit out the liquid. I’d prefer a metered dose if possible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon player

customer_reviews.title: Best probiotic with vitamin d!
customer_reviews.text: We love this Probiotic with Vitamin D for our littlest. She enjoys taking her vitamins every day and the flavor is fine ( i tried it). Would love to find this in A multivitamin version for her as she isn't ready for gummy vitamins yet.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2Coops

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Came in perfect condition. After trying different brands my doctor recommended this and I always buy it, it’s the only one that doesn’t give my son gas.
customer_reviews.author: Roberto Rocha

customer_reviews.title: Tasteless
customer_reviews.text: I taste everything I give to my 5 month old son ‘ to my surprise, these drops are tasteless. I give it to him on a spoon and bc there’s no flavor, he doesn’t fight me or spit it out. Kinda weird that it’s a little gritty but I’m always sure to shake it well before use.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I've used these drops since my son was a few weeks old. I quickly noticed a change in his stool - it went from being runny to more solid within a few days. He rarely has tummy or constipation issues.
customer_reviews.author: ChelAnJoh

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend for bowel issues in newborns
customer_reviews.text: My newborn was having trouble having bowel movements and these drops definitely helped regulate her and make her more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: kristen

customer_reviews.title: Made my baby vomit
customer_reviews.text: My baby (2 months old) projectile vomited multiple times within a few hours of me giving her one drop with breastmilk. I gave her body a 2 week break and tried it again - same result, she projectile vomited.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Bolognone

customer_reviews.title: EXAMINE contents when they arrive, came open
customer_reviews.text: Had to re-order due to the first bottle and the dropper coming in opened! I did not have to use this product until started supplementing with formula, but wish I had inspected the contents when it shipped a couple months ago, and this stuff is NOT cheap....
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken? More like destroyed
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with a completely destroyed dropper. Luckily I have gas drops as well so I rinsed out the dropper for those until I can get to the store.... don’t include a glass dropper if it’s going to be completely shattered..... box was in perfect shape
customer_reviews.author: Liz Crowley

customer_reviews.title: 2 products in one
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's vegan and it's 2 products in one. But I feel like being shipped in a hot truck and left in my hot mailbox may have affected the probiotics. Should probably be shipped with an ice pack or something
customer_reviews.author: Lisa D.

customer_reviews.title: Got wrong kind but still used it
customer_reviews.text: Got sent the wrong ones. I got the daily use ones not the ones with vitamin D. I didn't really see a difference in my son when I used them daily, he was still super gassy. I changed it up to 2-3 times a week and his gas seems a lot better.
customer_reviews.author: KMooney

customer_reviews.title: Big NOPE
customer_reviews.text: Product seems to be defected. Clumpy liquid. Looks like mold. I gave to my baby without noticing it. Didn’t notice til second dose. So upset. Was shipped very poorly as well. Box arrived damage
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite and cheaper than in the store where I found ...
customer_reviews.text: My favorite and cheaper than in the store where I found it for about $30
customer_reviews.author: Mcgomery

customer_reviews.title: Not all probiotics are created equal.
customer_reviews.text: Everyone's body chemistry is different, but even after 2 weeks we saw little to no improvement with our daughters stomach. We switched to the Pro gaia ones and had better luck.
customer_reviews.author: christian neal

customer_reviews.title: GOOD PRODUCT BUT WAS EXPIRED
customer_reviews.text: Im giving the drops a 5 star because they work good however thankfully I checked the expiration date as they expired in May 2018. I made the purchase in January 2019 and contacted Amazon to notify them of the expiration.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Helped our baby after a while. I don't think ...
customer_reviews.text: Helped our baby after a while. I don't think they made a huge difference. I think the bigger problem was the medicine he was on at the time was backing him up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After two weeks of use it was filled with white ...
customer_reviews.text: After two weeks of use it was filled with white looking chunks/particles. I wasn't sure what it was and didn't dare give it to my baby so we threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: momlife

customer_reviews.title: Happy baby. Happy mommy.
customer_reviews.text: We have already noticed a difference in DDs comfort. The drops work great and having vitamin D incorporated makes it easy. I do wish the label allowed you to see the fluid level in the bottle. I cut the label in half and shorter to allow me to confirm the fluid level to keep on top of the need to reorder. The drops seems to make such a difference I don't want to risk running out.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley E.

customer_reviews.title: Love that it's two products in one and still costs ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it's two products in one and still costs less than the probiotics. However I subscribed and before the first shipment it went up two dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: EXPIRED PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: Ran out of Gerber Soothe so decided to try this (we love Mommy's Bliss Gripe Water). Gave 5 drops to my baby and the entire day/night he was screaming, gassy and so uncomfortable. Looked at the package and came to find out the drops EXPIRED OVER A YEAR AGO. Do not buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marissa Lucero

customer_reviews.title: 2 in 1!
customer_reviews.text: We love this probiotic! It keeps our baby regular with bms and it has vitamin D so we only have to give her one medicine daily..that’s definitely a plus!

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It got us over a hurdle with our baby! Would recommend this

customer_reviews.text: Perfect drops for babies! Love how its both probiotic and vitamin D drops!

customer_reviews.text: This product didn’t work for my baby. Also, the box for these drops was broken

customer_reviews.title: I love other mommy's bliss products but this one didn't work ...
customer_reviews.text: After using for two weeks my little one became gassy. I switched probiotics and now she's not gassy anymore. I love other mommy's bliss products but this one didn't work for us.

customer_reviews.text: Used another brand that ended up doing nothing for my son, switched to mommy bliss and am very satisfied with the results. Seems to help my son a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Small bottle

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for us. Our baby started crying after ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for us. Our baby started crying after meals when we introduced the product. We stopped it immediately and so did the crying. The rest of it is just sitting on the shelf

customer_reviews.title: ... he was about 6 months old and he does great with it
customer_reviews.text: I give these to my son daily since he was about 6 months old and he does great with it. I just drop it in his mouth and he takes it without a complaint. This definitely keeps his bowels regular. I also believe it boosts his immune system.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I really like that they have combined the probiotic with vitamin d. No complaints and baby takes it great mixed in with breastmilk.

customer_reviews.title: Helped my BF baby
customer_reviews.text: Baby is 8 mths old and I have been is these since she was about 2 mths. Definitely helped her tummy troubles.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for newborn
customer_reviews.text: Helped my newborn a lot with his tummy issues and helped him poop right away

customer_reviews.title: I've tried a few different brands over the years (mama ...
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a few different brands over the years (mama of 4) and thos one is now my go to. Gentler on babies stomach and helps baby stay regular.

customer_reviews.text: I received a box that was beat up and expired a year ago.

customer_reviews.title: I bought this for my 8 month old son. ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 month old son. He had thrush and after using this for 4 days along with his medication it helped clear up the thrush. I tried the medication alone for 2 weeks, before getting the drops.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My baby never wanna take the enfamil vitamin D. But she loves this and poop well

customer_reviews.text: I feel it has helped my daughter with her colic. She hasn't been crying as much since we started and seems to pass has easier.

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Her pediatrician recommended vitamin D Drops and a probiotic and these fit the bill. My little one takes them easily and doesn't notice it tastes.

customer_reviews.title: And the dropper is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Colic remarkably improved when using these. And the dropper is easy to use.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.text: Twice this product has arrived with a broken glass dropper.

customer_reviews.title: One Star

customer_reviews.title: Miracle Drops!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. We don't know why it works but if you've got a screaming newborn who you suspect is having indigestion or colicky symptoms, this worked wonders for us. Immediately after giving our baby a dose, you could hear her stomach gurgling as the magic whatever-it-is settled her stomach instantly. I've recomended this to friends with newborns who also are so amazed by how well it works. Tastes a bit like anise but its very mild. No clue how or why it works but we're pretty convinced it's helped us get some sleep.
customer_reviews.author: LRH

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: The combo of the probiotic and the Vit D drops means I only have to worry about my baby taking one things versus two!
customer_reviews.author: Casey Norris

customer_reviews.title: Goes bad fast
customer_reviews.text: I kept it refrigerated since opening it and it grew mold after 9 days of use.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great probiotic for baby!
customer_reviews.text: We love these probiotic drops and the fact that they include Vitamin D so we only have to worry about giving our breastfed son one thing every morning. We've been using these since he was about 6 weeks (he's 4 months now) and they really seem the help his digestion. Also love the Amazon subscribe and save option.
customer_reviews.author: K. McPherson

customer_reviews.title: Incorrect description
customer_reviews.text: This says probiotic + vitamin D. It does not include vitamin D. The description is incredibly inaccurate
customer_reviews.author: Trudy Pace

customer_reviews.title: I use these drops in my son's breast milk bottles ...
customer_reviews.text: I use these drops in my son's breast milk bottles for daycare. He doesn't seem to notice that it's in there. Maybe coincidental, maybe not, but after trying the Gerber Soothe drops for 2 months and not seeing much change, I switched to these and I really think they've made a difference in my son's tummy issues. He just turned 3 months old so it's hard to say how much of an effect they've had. We'll continue to use them though.
customer_reviews.author: danim

customer_reviews.title: What More Could You Ask For?
customer_reviews.text: The combo of probiotics and Vitamin D in liquid form for infants is great. Instead of two droppers a day, I only have to give my daughter one. My doctor really likes that this is a combo and has been recommending this brand to her other clients since I introduced her to these two months ago. I kind of wish this had more then one strain of probiotic, but overall, I am very happy with this item.
customer_reviews.author: MJ Vanderhoef

customer_reviews.title: I can't tell if it makes a difference or not ...
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell if it makes a difference or not. Kiddo makes a face at the taste but he still accepts it.
customer_reviews.author: A. Odell

customer_reviews.title: Happier baby!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 2 months old and with consistent use, she definitely has less gas and fussiness. She doesn't love the taste, and since she's exclusively breastfed I can't mix it in a bottle, but with a little coaxing she will swallow it anyway. Hate that it costs so much but I will definitely be ordering more!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! I put it in my son's bottle every morning....I swear this product is the reason my son does not have tummy troubles. We have been using it since he was about 8 weeks old. I was having to use gripe water multiple times a day or else my son couldn't poo and would strain, fuss, and cry. Since using this, we haven't had anymore bathroom problems. I also love that this includes Vit D because our Dr. recommend he be given them every day (he is strictly breastfed). My only complaint- the price. I feel like the product is princely especially when the bottle doesn't arrive full.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Wu

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper than Gerber soothe but not the same
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended Gerber Soothe but it costs more and I couldnt figure out why. Well turns out it doesn't have the same good bacteria recommended by my Dr that has been proven to help with gas-digestion. I ended up finding it from a brand called GioGaia Protectis. I was recommended the bacteria L. reuteri and this product doesn't carry that.
customer_reviews.author: Mel W

customer_reviews.title: Love this brand
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to streamline a bit (I was buying the probiotic and then the vitamin d drops). Unfortunately, my daughter can't keep down vitamin d, so I'll go back to using just the probiotic drops. Love this brand, though, so I'll stick with it.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Latini

customer_reviews.title: Subscribe & save this product!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was spitting up A LOT after meals about once every other day and having terrible, painful gas. We were recommended this and it changed almost instantly. She takes this every morning, but I can tell immediately if I've forgotten to give it to her that day because she starts getting gassy and spits up. Just suggested this to a friend that had a baby last week!
customer_reviews.author: Whit723

customer_reviews.title: Hard pass
customer_reviews.text: Terrible! I used these years ago with my first born and never had any issues. I refrigerated these and everything and for some reason they had thick floating particles within a few days of opening. I tried on 3 separate accounts to see if my son needed time to adjust. They just have him a horrible stomach ache and terrible gas. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Dws

customer_reviews.title: Garbage don't buy
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this product zero stars I would. I bought this for my 8 week old daughter from a recomondation from her doctor... every Sikh glee time I give this to her, she screams herself to sleep and throws 90% of it back up. It is pure corn oil and NOT easy on her tummy. I loved mommy's bliss products until now.
customer_reviews.author: laura

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Possible coincidence. But baby pooped 20min after. Almost 4m and goes a week between poops. Gerber sooth didn't regulate her. Hopefully this will stop the gas and spit ups
customer_reviews.author: Jonnelleoh

customer_reviews.title: These work great for my son
customer_reviews.text: These work great for my son! I love that the vitamin D supplement is included in the formula. I also love the dropper that comes with it. I've used other probiotic drops that have a top like the ones used in essential oils and that was so much more difficult. The only downfall is that he doesn't love the taste (always makes a face when i give it to him) but he doesn't seem to mind it too much. He always opens his mouth excited to take it! I would definitely recommend these!
customer_reviews.author: Cory & Brianna Cunningham

customer_reviews.title: A must have product for my baby
customer_reviews.text: Gentle for my babies tummy and helps keep her regular. Great deal on Amazon. Target is too overpriced for the same product.
customer_reviews.author: KR

customer_reviews.title: Really helped
customer_reviews.text: So the doctor said to give our baby vitamin D as she was being breastfed exclusively and she was also having issues with gas. We went with this and have had no issues with gas or constipation. Its natural and only ingredient was corn oil while others had a bigger list.
customer_reviews.author: Moises Garcia Landeros

customer_reviews.title: Good for aiding digestion
customer_reviews.text: My son is a C-section baby so he didn't have the opportunity to populate diverse gut flora. These drops are great and help his digestion immensely. I'm not a big fan of the dropper but it works.
customer_reviews.author: MedFam

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE!
customer_reviews.text: Our baby has been on the probiotics with vitamin D since she was a new born she’s 5 months and I truly think this has contributed to her not getting sick from me or daddy cause we’ve both been sick a couple times and she’s stayed healthy thank God!
customer_reviews.author: idomakeupnhair

customer_reviews.title: Seems to work!
customer_reviews.text: We've been using this for our 2 year old son for 3 months now and have no complaints. It keeps him nice and regular and seems to almost eliminate stomach problems for him. He was having issues with discomfort we he needed to go and hasn't had any trouble since we started using this. I was happy to find one that had Vitamin D so we only have to give him one medicine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These seem to be good drops. We were hoping that the probiotic would ...
customer_reviews.text: These seem to be good drops. We were hoping that the probiotic would help his regularity which it didn't but other than that it was an easy to use eye dropper so we are still happy with this method of giving him probiotic and vitamin D.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn & Kristen Newton

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t work for us, corn oil wasn’t good the baby’s stomach.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: Probiotics and vitamin D in one bottle! What a great idea! Such a good idea to make it easier for moms! I love this product! It makes it quicker to give my baby her vitamin D and a probiotic all at once!
customer_reviews.author: Karen Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Great Vitamin D/Probiotic mix
customer_reviews.text: Love that these have Probiotic and vitamin D in one easy to use dropper!!! Be sure to read instructions about to properly use, store and when to dispose of product.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for my newborn
customer_reviews.text: These didn’t sit well with my newborn and he ended up vomiting all day after I used them. Maybe I just got a bad batch? But hey everyone’s babies are different and I loved the concept of these drops.
customer_reviews.author: Megan M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste the money
customer_reviews.text: The item pictured is not the item sent...or at least the one I received and is being returned. The item that was delivered was just probiotics not containing the vitamin D.
customer_reviews.author: WifeMomLove

customer_reviews.title: Was great while it lasted.
customer_reviews.text: It lasted about the time they said maybe a little less... and I think it really helped my baby and he looked forward to taking it every morning, just to bad the price went up so much. So I stopped buying it. Can not spend that much money on that every month...
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

product_meta.title: Mommy's Bliss - Probiotic Drops + Vitamin D - 0.34 FL OZ Bottle
feature_bullets: Infant Probiotics: Mommy's Bliss Baby Probiotic Drops + Vitamin D use the most researched probiotic strain. Baby Probiotic Drops + Vitamin D are a daily dose of liquid vitamin D and a probiotic supplement for babies, gentle and safe enough for newborns

Mommy's Bliss Baby Probiotic Drops + Vitamin D use the most researched probiotic strain. Baby Probiotic Drops + Vitamin D are a daily dose of liquid vitamin D and a probiotic supplement for babies, gentle and safe enough for newborns

Baby probiotics: A healthy gut means a happy tummy, and probiotics can help keep baby's belly happy by supporting their digestive system as they digest food and absorb vitamins. Mommy's Bliss probiotics are pediatrician recommended

Remedies for Baby: Our remedies help ease baby's discomfort and bring back smiles. From gripe water to help calm colic or tummy troubles, to organic baby cough syrup, baby probiotic drops, or baby vitamins, we help you find your parenting bliss
Stock up with our gentle remedies to help bring comfort for the occasional cough, or colicky tummy trouble. Probiotic drops and vitamins help support healthy immune systems, for healthy, happy kids

For Moms, By Moms: Mommy's Bliss is on a mission to bring bliss to parents everywhere. You and your little one will love our products if you've used ones from brands like BioGaia, Gerber, Evivo, Little Remedies, Zarbees, Colic Calm, Sambucol, and Maty's
